are you feeling happy today i

and yes we are back together again it is myself

and it would appear that there are still lots of

name is duncan i talk about english i like the

will live together happily ever after

forever and ever i like english very much 
i am not like the other english teachers

there are many things that separate me from

out of the way yes we have made it all the

is it okay are you having a good one i hope

can you see i am losing weight can you tell maybe

i have lost some weight do you think so

now can you please leave a comment right now and

but i have can you see can you see my face 
does it look different does it look as if

i've lost some weight now personally i think 
i have i think i have been so well behaved

i have been a good boy over the past three 
months i have started cutting down on the

amount of junk that i eat i'm exercising a 
lot more than i was i'm taking lots of walks

but most of all i think the biggest change of 
all is the change of diet which i i i used to do

a long time ago but then of course you know 
what happens you start off doing something

with the best intention and then over time 
you slowly slip back in to your old habits

so it can be difficult if you are 
trying to make a big change in your life

it doesn't come easy it's like anything including

live streams of course now we are into november

i can't believe it and we all 
know what that means i think
i think it might be 52 days
until christmas

i can't believe it suddenly november arrives and 
already on television there are lots of christmas

commercials it would appear that people are 
quite desperate this year to get your money

to buy things which is ironic really when you 
think about it it's quite ironic that here we are

right now talking about trying to save the planet 
and yet every year we we rush out we buy gifts for

people maybe things that people don't even want or 
need but we still buy them because we feel obliged

to do it so uh to be honest with you i'm going to 
be honest you know me i'm an honest man sometimes

i say things that might obsess or irritate people 
but i think sometimes buying gifts for people

is a waste of money and also 
the resources of the planet

so i know that is quite a big 
generalization but i think sometimes

celebrations like christmas you see it 
is fun but we all feel obliged or forced

to give things to other people i 
think sometimes it is a little unfair

that we expect so much from other people i 
think that's part of the problem you see we all

expect too much of each other especially 
when it comes to celebrations maybe birthdays

christmas maybe another type of celebration 
maybe a wedding i think weddings

are now crazy they are weddings are crazy people 
spend a huge amount of money on their weddings

thousands of pounds and then this is the best 
part they actually send a list of things they want

to the guests so you can choose a gift 
that you want to give to the happy couple

after their wedding so they can enjoy it and 
use it now i think all of this is a little bit

what's the word i'm looking for well i think there 
is a lot of pressure being put on people to give

gifts when in fact sometimes just having the 
company having the company of another human being

feeling the warmth be it physical or maybe just 
the sound of another person's voice someone near

to you or maybe someone just saying hello i just 
thought i would give you a phone call to say

i'm thinking of you that's all you need to do so 
i think nowadays we we often find that there is

too much pressure too much pressure to actually do 
these things to give gifts and it's all the time

it's all the time whatever you do people have pets 
now and they have to celebrate the pet's birthday
and even the dog or the cat wants a gift

the owner feels obliged to give 
a present to the cat or the dog

as if it matters the dog doesn't 
care the cat couldn't care less

very strange don't you think so i think there is a 
lot of waste a lot of wasteful behaviour connected
to celebrations such as birthdays and especially

christmas or maybe if there is another festival 
or something else something else you would observe

there is often gifts involved and i think 
sometimes the pressure of having to give

gifts to people can can drive you crazy don't 
you think what do you think about that am i

am i right or am i talking a load of rubbish 
please comment talking of which we are talking

all about comments today making comments about

you've left a comment on a website 
these days it is possible to comment

on almost anything when you think about 
it it doesn't have to be a big thing

or a small thing it can be anything even here 
on youtube quite often people excuse me a moment

about that i will try again

people can leave comments anywhere 
at any time for any reason

spend it on something that might be useful maybe

so your children when they are born when

zebra zip zither zone zoo buzz crazy

you tweak this word can also be 
used as a noun and as a verb as well

so the word tweak to make a slight 
change or an adjustment to something

a small alteration made to something is 
a tweak tweak tweet tweak the word is

often used in engineering or with anything 
related to a slight change in how something

works so if you make a slight change or a 
small alteration we can describe that as a

tweak tweak i like that word actually it's a nice 
word our second strange word today is dormant

dormant our second unusual word today is dormant 
to be in a state of deep sleep or hibernation

to be alive but not growing and in active items 
so if something is inactive it is inactive

it is not doing anything but it is still 
alive a disease that no longer causes symptoms

but is not cured so something that 
maybe has disappeared maybe the symptoms

have vanished but you still have the 
disease and perhaps also you can still pass

the disease on to other people so something that 
is dormant something that is in a state of deep

sleep or hibernation so the word dormant is an 
adjective it describes the way something appears

very nice thank you very much so earlier 
on i was talking about my appearance

i was asking for your comments not necessarily 
compliments you don't have to give compliments

so maybe you think i haven't lost any weight 
maybe you think mr duncan you still look as big

as you did last week or last month or 
last year but today we are looking at

comments and criticism two things that 
often go together when we think of comments

we often think of things that we make a comment on 
we talk about a certain thing in relation to our

experience of it maybe your point of view maybe 
your thoughts on a certain subject or a thing

a comment is a remark made in response 
to something so quite often we will offer

a comment we will give a comment as a response 
you will you will very rarely comment on something

without there being a reason for it 
something you've seen something you've

heard something you've experienced in the 
past maybe something you've just experienced

maybe a good thing or a bad thing maybe you 
went somewhere maybe you visited a certain place

maybe you had a meal at a restaurant and 
you are giving your comments about it

an observation made regarding something 
observed or experienced so again

something you see or something you 
experienced quite often you will offer

a comment about it maybe you are asked to give 
a comment maybe you are asked to give your own

personal comment about what you thought 
of that experience did you enjoy the meal

did you enjoy the show what did you think 
of my english lesson was it interesting

please leave a comment so an observation made 
regarding something observed or experienced

commentary given or made either in 
writing or verbally is a comment

so you can write your comment you can 
state your comment verbally you can say it

so what do you think what did you think 
of the show what did you think of the meal

well i thought the meal was okay it was all right 
unfortunately the steak was a little bit dry

so i might be giving my comment but also i might 
be giving criticism as well at the same time so

quite often you might find that your comment 
can also be criticism and that's the reason why

we often associate those two 
things with each other a person

will make a comment a person makes a 
comment they make a comment you comment

on something they comment on something a thing an 
event an experience whether they liked it or not

to give an opinion is to comment and yes this 
is true quite often when we give an opinion that

in itself is a comment so whatever it is you are 
commenting on quite often it will also be stated

as an opinion what you feel or what you think 
a comment can be in the form of a compliment

or as criticism so as i just said you can say 
something nice or maybe say something that is

honest to be honest when you are giving 
a comment quite often people will want

your honest opinion when you make a comment to 
be critical about something is to give a thorough

evaluation oh so if you are being critical it 
means you are looking at that particular thing

and then you are giving your opinion 
your comment is being given honestly

the commenter expresses their opinion quite 
often as an expert so there are people who

make a living there are people whose job is to 
give comments maybe a person who is an expert

in food maybe they are an expert in art 
an expert in music maybe their background

involves that particular field they are in a 
position where they can give comments we often

describe this person as a critic a critic is a 
person who offers their professional comments

or their professional opinion we often describe 
them as a critic maybe a film critic a food critic

theatre cricket or maybe an art critic 
many types of criticism can be given

a critical comment is not necessarily 
negative so if you are looking at something

or evaluating something a particular thing 
it doesn't necessarily have to be bad

maybe there are bad points or negative points but 
also there might be some positive things as well

quite often when you comment on 
something you will give the good things

your good opinions your positive thoughts and also 
now and again your negative thoughts and opinions

we often describe a type of comment as critique 
oh i like that word critique so when we say a

person is offering critique it means they are 
offering their comment their personal appearance

their opinion a person might comment on something 
trivial like the weather so you can comment

on something very trivial oh it's a bit 
dark today it's a bit dull it's a bit dismal

isn't it cold we are commenting on 
how the weather is making us feel

we are showing that we are not happy with 
the weather we are making a comment maybe

the weather is nice maybe it is a lovely 
day so perhaps your comment will be positive

a comment can be made concerning a world event 
or an important issue so it can be anything a

lot of people at the moment are commenting on 
environmental issues saving the planet a lot of

people have their own comments their own opinions 
their own points of view about what they think

a lot of world leaders are commenting and 
giving their opinions on something that

a lot of people think is very important 
a comment is normally given honestly

and i think this is where comments or giving 
a comment can sometimes get you into trouble

if you want a person to give you 
their comment quite often you

expect that person to give you an 
honest comment what they really think

but is that true do we really want 
to hear the truth a truthful comment

might not be received well we can also say that 
it is not well received so if something is not

well received it means people did not like 
it a person did not receive that comment well

they were upset by the comment it was not received 
well it was not well received the truth expressed

might seem harsh or unfair so when 
we talk about a harsh comment a harsh

criticism or maybe we might see it as unfair an 
unfair criticism or an unfair comment that is

made against someone so i suppose it is possible 
if a person is criticizing or making comments

about another person's work maybe sometimes 
they can be too harsh maybe their criticism

is unfair and it does happen sometimes people 
have reasons why they will give an unfair comment

their own personal reasons if you ask for a 
comment then you must be prepared for criticism

never ask a person for their comments if you 
don't want to hear criticism because you might

actually also have to do that as well you see 
you might have to accept the harsh criticism

so if you ask for a comment then you must 
be prepared to receive criticism as well
some people cannot take criticism this is true

perhaps you in the past have received criticism 
for something maybe you think that the criticism

or the comment you received was unfair or harsh it 
can happen if you are in the public eye then you

must be prepared for negative comments one of the 
first things i realized when i started doing this

on youtube 15 years ago was that sometimes 
people can offer harsh or hurtful comments

they can say things that might be hurtful 
or they that might cause upset or hurt
thank you very much
